wikipedia_page.main: Kirsten McAslan (born 1 September 1993) is a British sprinter. She competed in the 4 × 400 metres relay event at the 2015 World Championships in Athletics in Beijing, China. Her best in the 400 m sprint is 52.13s.

2015 European Athletics Indoor Championships – Women's 400 metres
Seren Bundy-Davies
response: At the Birmingham Indoor Grand Prix at the start of 2015 she ran a personal best of 51.72 seconds to win the race. This run took Bundy-Davies top of the European Indoor rankings, and despite a fall in the British Athletics Indoor Championships, she was selected to represent Great Britain for the first time at the 2015 European Athletics Indoor Championships. There she won a bronze in the 400 metres, and a silver in 4 × 400 metres relay teamed with Laura Maddox, Kirsten McAslan and Kelly Massey.
